summary.blockquote: NOTENote: Although the interface is available outside secure contexts, the property is not, thus custom s cannot be defined outside them.

remarks.para: The AudioWorkletNode interface of the Web Audio API represents a base class for a user-defined , which can be connected to an audio routing graph along with other nodes. It has an associated , which does the actual audio processing in a Web Audio rendering thread.
